backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, booking leads, authorization checks, blob storage, and rate‑card upload logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record listing a profile-page update requirement and its associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React root element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling routing, deep-linking logic, authentication states, and backend actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, account menu, share dialog, and conditional owner-mode leads access.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple component rendering square or wide logo variants from static assets.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI with reload option and error details when uncaught errors occur.
frontend/src/components/OwnerNotAuthoriz: Shows an unauthorized access message, displays the user's principal ID with copy support, and optionally links to booking or rate card pages.
frontend/src/components/RatePricingSecti: Renders pricing tables for hourly, local transfer, and rental rates along with important notes and additional rate info.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Displays customer and owner shareable URLs with copy and open actions, providing separate links for bookings and admin access.
frontend/src/components/TripTotalCalcula: Calculates trip cost based on vehicle type, trip type, distance, and rates, showing a breakdown when distance is entered.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Loads and displays the caller’s profile avatar with a fallback image and icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with optional admin token setup, exposes actor state, and manages query invalidation and warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: React hook for reading and writing values to localStorage with SSR-safe checks and JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that wrap backend actor calls for booking leads, rate cards, user profile management, and authorization checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: Page component rendering a booking form with validation and submission to create a booking lead.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Page for viewing booking leads with polling, role-based authorization, notification sounds, and localStorage state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity auth, app mode logic, and navigation buttons based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to initialize profiles, upload display pictures, and copy shareable links.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Rate card page enabling authenticated users to view pricing details and admins to upload or download rate card files.
frontend/src/utils/appMode.ts: Utility for determining, getting, and setting the app mode between customer and owner.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Generates canonical shareable URLs with optional mode and deep-link parameters and supports clipboard copying.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides a helper to trigger browser downloads for binary files.
frontend/src/utils/mapBackendError.ts: Maps backend error messages into user-friendly strings with categorized handling.
frontend/src/utils/rates.ts: Centralized rate constants and helper functions for vehicle pricing, allowances, and trip calculations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash and query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for persisting user profile photos.
